welcome.headline: Your healthcare team wants to better understand your needs.
welcome.body: Answer 10 quick questions about your living situation. Most patients finish in under 5 minutes.
welcome.privacy: Your answers are confidential and will not affect your eligibility for care.

questions.q1: In the past 12 months, have you been homeless or worried about losing your housing?
questions.q2: Are you worried about losing your housing in the next 2 months?
questions.q3: In the past 12 months, did you ever worry that your food would run out before you had money to buy more?
questions.q4: In the past 12 months, has a lack of reliable transportation kept you from medical appointments, meetings, work, or getting things you need?
questions.q5: In the past 12 months, has the electric, gas, oil, or water company threatened to shut off services in your home?
questions.q6: Are you worried about losing utilities in the next 2 months?
questions.q7: Do you feel physically and emotionally safe where you currently live?
questions.q8: In the past 12 months, have you been hit, kicked, punched, or otherwise hurt by someone?
questions.q9: Are you a refugee or seeking asylum?
questions.q10: Would you like your healthcare team to help connect you to local resources?

questionSupport.general: Answering honestly helps your care team support you.
questionSupport.benefits: This will not affect your benefits.
questionSupport.sensitiveSkip: You can skip by choosing 'Prefer not to answer.'

privacy.title: Some questions may feel personal.
privacy.message: You can choose 'Prefer not to answer' if you're uncomfortable. Your answers are private and only shared with your healthcare team.
